post.author: phantazm11
post.body:
Hey,

This map has been sitting on my HD for a while now. I decided to finish it up and send it out into the world.

Description: Set deep within the industrial outskirts of toontown, this cel-shaded level is packed
with high voltage action. The map will require a fast hand and an even quicker eye
in order to survive the multi-level complex.

Type: Duel/Tourney



Special thanks to Herr W for making Monkeys of Doom and inspiring the style of this map. Also thanks to SyncError for letting me use a few of his _color textures.

download: http://planetquake.gamespy.com/View.php ... ail&id=121

phantazm11

post.author: g0th
post.body: Gameplay looks really good and those clouds are very sexy

post.author: phantazm11
post.body:
Thanks a lot g0th.

lol @ the clouds. I wanted to do a map that was fun and goofy. Guess it worked
